title: The Lost Art of Gratitude
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: Isabel suppressed the urge to laugh. She could picture the encounter: the outraged Grace and the phlegmatic driver, trying to drive a bus along Grange Road while being berated by his passenger.

title: Rambles in Europe:
author: Morrison, Leonard Allison
snippet: d., author of many charming religious hymns, is pastor of a church in the city. I went to hear him, but failed, and the same sunny Sabbath afternoon visited the Grange Road cemetery, where some are sleeping whose lives honored Scotland and benefited mankind. There was the grave of Rev. Thomas Guthrie, d.

title: Rambles in Europe ... With historical facts relating to Scotch-American families, gathered in Scotland and the North of Ireland ... Illustrated
